title: Kanye West hosts Sunday Service outside a Mormon conference
text:
Kanye took his Sunday Service to Salt Lake City (Picture: SundayService.com)

Kanye West has been taking his Sunday Service across America and his latest stop saw him perform in Salt Lake City… right outside a Mormon conference.

Ye chose to head on over to Utah with his choir in tow but chose the exact same spot where a ‘general conference’ – an annual get-together hosted by Mormons – was being held.

Fans were quick to point it out on Twitter, with one sharing a video of a huge crowd of fans that had turned out for Kanye.

They joked: ‘Watching Mormon missionaries try to convert people while @kanyewest and the #SundayService choir belt gossip… Classic #justUtahthings.’

Watching Mormon missionaries try to convert people while ⁦@kanyewest⁩ and the #SundayService choir belt gospel… Classic. #justUtahthings pic.twitter.com/8dErM16R4H — Emily Krebs (@kkrreebbss) October 5, 2019

TMZ reports that Kanye had put on his service right next to the Gateway Centre in Salt Lake City and even preached to fans at one point, giving them his views on God, social media and society while playing his track Jesus Walks.

Usually, Kanye hosts his Sunday Service in Los Angeles, near his home in Calabasas with wife Kim Kardashian and their four kids.

But, recently, the Gold Digger hit-maker has been upping sticks and fans have seen him bring his choir to the likes of Cody, Wyoming, where he recently bought a family ranch, and New York too.

And while they might be getting to see Kanye in action, fans are still waiting on the rapper to drop his new album.

It had been given a release date of 27 September, but the album was pushed back to a later date, with still no word from Kanye on when his new work will actually drop.

Kim had said the album, titled Jesus Is King, was postponed again so Kanye could make just a few final tweaks.

She said: ‘Kanye’s doing a listening session in Chicago tomorrow, then NYC Sunday. ‘He’s dropping the album Sunday. Just a few final tweaks to the mixes.’

It’s thought Kanye is still working on finalising the album, as he’s still not quite happy with it just yet…
